original_text: Who ought to have been here before thee, and object, if they had ought against me.
korean_text: 그들이 만일 나를 반대할 사건이 있으면 마땅히 당신 앞에 와서 고발하였을 것이요

sentences.original_text: Who ought to have been here before thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 앞에 와 있었어야 할 자들이

sentences.original_text: if they had ought against me
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 나에게 반대할 것이 있다면
